metadata.title: NIST SP 800-60 Vol 2 Rev 1 Information Type Catalog
metadata.source: NIST SP 800-60 Volume II Revision 1, August 2008
metadata.description: Provisional security categorization of federal information types per FIPS 199. Each information type includes recommended confidentiality, integrity, and availability impact levels. Agencies must review and adjust these provisional levels based on mission-specific requirements.

categories.name: Services Delivery
categories.description: Mission-based information types that support the delivery of services to citizens, other governments, and external entities.

subcategories.name: Defense and National Security
subcategories.description: Information types related to national defense, military operations, and national security activities.

information_types.name: Strategic Defense and Intelligence Information
information_types.description: Information supporting strategic defense planning, nuclear deterrence, and intelligence activities critical to national security.

information_types.name: Tactical Defense Information
information_types.description: Information supporting tactical military operations including force deployment, battlefield coordination, and combat support.

information_types.name: Military Operations Support
information_types.description: Information supporting military operations planning, command and control, and operational readiness activities.

information_types.name: Logistics Management
information_types.description: Information supporting defense logistics including supply chain, materiel management, and distribution operations.

subcategories.name: Homeland Security
subcategories.description: Information types related to protecting the homeland from threats, border security, and critical infrastructure protection.

information_types.name: Border and Transportation Security
information_types.description: Information supporting border control, immigration enforcement, and transportation security screening operations.

information_types.name: Domestic Terrorism and Counterintelligence
information_types.description: Information supporting the detection, prevention, and investigation of domestic terrorism and counterintelligence threats.

information_types.name: Key Asset and Critical Infrastructure Protection
information_types.description: Information supporting the identification, assessment, and protection of key assets and critical infrastructure sectors.

information_types.name: Catastrophic Defense
information_types.description: Information supporting defense against catastrophic threats including chemical, biological, radiological, and nuclear incidents.

subcategories.name: Intelligence Operations
subcategories.description: Information types related to the intelligence community's collection, analysis, and dissemination activities.

information_types.name: Intelligence Collection and Analysis
information_types.description: Information supporting the collection, processing, and analysis of intelligence from all sources to produce actionable intelligence products.

information_types.name: Intelligence Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting the planning and direction of intelligence activities including requirements definition and resource allocation.

information_types.name: Intelligence Dissemination
information_types.description: Information supporting the distribution of finished intelligence products to authorized consumers and policymakers.

information_types.name: Counterintelligence
information_types.description: Information supporting activities to identify, assess, and neutralize foreign intelligence threats to national security.

subcategories.name: Disaster Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to disaster preparedness, response, recovery, and mitigation activities.

information_types.name: Disaster Monitoring and Prediction
information_types.description: Information supporting the monitoring of natural and man-made hazards and prediction of potential disaster events.

information_types.name: Disaster Preparedness and Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting disaster preparedness activities including emergency planning, training, and exercise programs.

information_types.name: Disaster Repair and Restoration
information_types.description: Information supporting post-disaster repair, restoration of services, and long-term recovery operations.

information_types.name: Emergency Response
information_types.description: Information supporting immediate emergency response operations including coordination of first responders and resource deployment.

subcategories.name: International Affairs and Commerce
subcategories.description: Information types related to foreign affairs, international development, and global trade activities.

information_types.name: Foreign Affairs
information_types.description: Information supporting the conduct of foreign policy, diplomatic relations, and international negotiations.

information_types.name: International Development and Humanitarian Aid
information_types.description: Information supporting international development programs, foreign assistance, and humanitarian relief operations.

information_types.name: Global Trade
information_types.description: Information supporting international trade policy, export controls, trade agreements, and commerce regulation.

subcategories.name: Natural Resources
subcategories.description: Information types related to the management and conservation of natural resources including water, land, and agriculture.

information_types.name: Water Resource Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the management, allocation, and protection of water resources including watersheds and aquifers.

information_types.name: Conservation and Land Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the conservation, preservation, and management of public lands and natural habitats.

information_types.name: Recreational Resource Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the management of recreational facilities, national parks, and public outdoor recreation areas.

information_types.name: Agricultural Innovation and Services
information_types.description: Information supporting agricultural research, crop and livestock management, and farming assistance programs.

subcategories.name: Energy
subcategories.description: Information types related to energy production, distribution, conservation, and preparedness.

information_types.name: Energy Supply
information_types.description: Information supporting energy production, generation, transmission, and distribution across the national energy grid.

information_types.name: Energy Conservation and Preparedness
information_types.description: Information supporting energy conservation programs, efficiency standards, and energy emergency preparedness planning.

information_types.name: Energy Resource Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the management of energy resources including petroleum reserves, nuclear materials, and renewable sources.

subcategories.name: Environmental Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to environmental monitoring, remediation, and pollution control.

information_types.name: Environmental Monitoring and Forecasting
information_types.description: Information supporting the monitoring of environmental conditions, weather forecasting, and climate data collection.

information_types.name: Environmental Remediation
information_types.description: Information supporting the cleanup and restoration of contaminated sites including Superfund and brownfield remediation.

information_types.name: Pollution Prevention and Control
information_types.description: Information supporting pollution prevention programs, emissions controls, and environmental regulatory compliance.

subcategories.name: Economic Development
subcategories.description: Information types related to economic development, business promotion, and financial sector oversight.

information_types.name: Business and Industry Development
information_types.description: Information supporting business development programs, small business assistance, and industry promotion activities.

information_types.name: Intellectual Property Protection
information_types.description: Information supporting the protection of patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets.

information_types.name: Financial Sector Oversight
information_types.description: Information supporting the regulation and oversight of financial institutions, markets, and banking operations.

information_types.name: Industry Sector Income Stabilization
information_types.description: Information supporting income stabilization programs for specific industries including agriculture and manufacturing.

subcategories.name: Community and Social Services
subcategories.description: Information types related to community development, social services, and public assistance programs.

information_types.name: Homeownership Promotion
information_types.description: Information supporting homeownership programs, mortgage assistance, and housing finance activities.

information_types.name: Community and Regional Development
information_types.description: Information supporting community development grants, regional planning, and neighborhood revitalization programs.

information_types.name: Social Services
information_types.description: Information supporting social welfare programs, child and family services, and assistance for vulnerable populations.

information_types.name: Postal Services
information_types.description: Information supporting postal and mail delivery operations, addressing systems, and postal financial services.

subcategories.name: Transportation
subcategories.description: Information types related to transportation infrastructure, safety, and operations across all modes.

information_types.name: Ground Transportation
information_types.description: Information supporting ground transportation systems including highways, rail, transit, and pipeline operations.

information_types.name: Air Transportation
information_types.description: Information supporting air transportation operations including air traffic control, aviation safety, and airport management.

information_types.name: Water Transportation
information_types.description: Information supporting maritime and inland waterway transportation, port operations, and vessel safety.

information_types.name: Space Operations
information_types.description: Information supporting space launch operations, satellite management, and space transportation systems.

subcategories.name: Education
subcategories.description: Information types related to educational programs, institutions, and cultural preservation.

information_types.name: Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education
information_types.description: Information supporting K-12 education programs, vocational training, and related federal education assistance.

information_types.name: Higher Education
information_types.description: Information supporting post-secondary education programs, financial aid, and higher education institutional management.

information_types.name: Cultural and Historic Preservation
information_types.description: Information supporting the preservation of cultural heritage, historic sites, museums, and national archives.

subcategories.name: Workforce Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to workforce training, employment services, and labor protections.

information_types.name: Training and Employment
information_types.description: Information supporting job training programs, employment services, and workforce development initiatives.

information_types.name: Worker Safety
information_types.description: Information supporting occupational safety and health programs, workplace inspections, and hazard prevention.

information_types.name: Labor Rights Management
information_types.description: Information supporting labor rights enforcement, collective bargaining oversight, and wage and hour compliance.

subcategories.name: Health
subcategories.description: Information types related to health care delivery, public health, and health care administration.

information_types.name: Access to Care
information_types.description: Information supporting health care access programs, insurance coverage, and health services availability for underserved populations.

information_types.name: Population Health Management and Consumer Safety
information_types.description: Information supporting public health surveillance, disease prevention, food and drug safety, and consumer health protection.

information_types.name: Health Care Administration
information_types.description: Information supporting health care program administration including Medicare, Medicaid, and other federal health programs.

information_types.name: Health Care Delivery Services
information_types.description: Information supporting the direct delivery of health care services through federal facilities and programs.

information_types.name: Health Care Research and Practitioner Education
information_types.description: Information supporting biomedical research, clinical trials, and health care professional training and education.

subcategories.name: Income Security
subcategories.description: Information types related to retirement, disability, unemployment, and other income support programs.

information_types.name: General Retirement and Disability
information_types.description: Information supporting retirement and disability benefit programs including Social Security and federal pension systems.

information_types.name: Unemployment Compensation
information_types.description: Information supporting unemployment insurance programs, claims processing, and benefit distribution.

information_types.name: Housing Assistance
information_types.description: Information supporting housing assistance programs including public housing, rental subsidies, and homelessness prevention.

information_types.name: Food and Nutrition Assistance
information_types.description: Information supporting food assistance programs including SNAP, WIC, and school meal programs.

information_types.name: Survivor Compensation
information_types.description: Information supporting survivor benefit programs including death benefits, survivor pensions, and victim compensation funds.

subcategories.name: Law Enforcement
subcategories.description: Information types related to law enforcement operations, criminal investigation, and public safety.

information_types.name: Criminal Apprehension
information_types.description: Information supporting the identification, location, and apprehension of criminal suspects and fugitives.

information_types.name: Criminal Investigation and Surveillance
information_types.description: Information supporting criminal investigations, surveillance operations, and forensic analysis activities.

information_types.name: Citizen Protection
information_types.description: Information supporting citizen protection services including witness protection, victim services, and public safety programs.

information_types.name: Crime Prevention
information_types.description: Information supporting crime prevention programs, community policing, and law enforcement outreach initiatives.

information_types.name: Leadership Protection
information_types.description: Information supporting the protection of senior government officials, heads of state, and other designated protectees.

subcategories.name: Litigation and Judicial Activities
subcategories.description: Information types related to the judicial system, legal proceedings, and dispute resolution.

information_types.name: Judicial Hearings
information_types.description: Information supporting the conduct of judicial hearings, court proceedings, and administrative adjudications.

information_types.name: Legal Defense
information_types.description: Information supporting legal defense activities including public defender services and government litigation defense.

information_types.name: Legal Investigation
information_types.description: Information supporting legal investigations, evidence collection, and pre-trial discovery activities.

information_types.name: Legal Prosecution and Litigation
information_types.description: Information supporting criminal prosecution, civil litigation, and enforcement actions by government attorneys.

information_types.name: Resolution Facilitation
information_types.description: Information supporting alternative dispute resolution, mediation, arbitration, and settlement negotiation processes.

subcategories.name: Federal Correctional Activities
subcategories.description: Information types related to the federal correctional system including incarceration and rehabilitation.

information_types.name: Criminal Incarceration
information_types.description: Information supporting federal correctional facility operations, inmate management, and detention services.

information_types.name: Criminal Rehabilitation
information_types.description: Information supporting offender rehabilitation programs, reentry services, and probation and parole supervision.

subcategories.name: General Government
subcategories.description: Information types related to central government functions including fiscal operations, legislation, and administration.

information_types.name: Central Fiscal Operations
information_types.description: Information supporting central fiscal operations including treasury management, debt management, and government-wide accounting.

information_types.name: Legislative Functions
information_types.description: Information supporting legislative processes including bill tracking, congressional records, and legislative analysis.

information_types.name: Executive Functions
information_types.description: Information supporting executive branch operations, policy development, and interagency coordination activities.

information_types.name: Central Property Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the management of federal property, real estate, and government-owned facilities.

information_types.name: Central Personnel Management
information_types.description: Information supporting government-wide personnel policies, civil service management, and federal workforce administration.

information_types.name: Taxation Management
information_types.description: Information supporting federal tax administration, tax collection, taxpayer services, and tax enforcement activities.

information_types.name: Central Records and Statistics Management
information_types.description: Information supporting federal records management, statistical data collection, and government-wide information sharing.

categories.name: Government Resource Management
categories.description: Support information types that enable the internal management of government resources including administrative, financial, human resource, information technology, and supply chain functions.

subcategories.name: Administrative Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to internal administrative support functions of government agencies.

information_types.name: Facilities, Fleet, and Equipment Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the management of government facilities, vehicle fleets, and equipment inventories.

information_types.name: Help Desk Services
information_types.description: Information supporting internal help desk operations, trouble ticket management, and user support services.

information_types.name: Security Management
information_types.description: Information supporting physical and personnel security operations, access control, and security clearance processing.

information_types.name: Travel
information_types.description: Information supporting government travel management, travel authorization, and travel expense reimbursement.

information_types.name: Workplace Policy Development and Management
information_types.description: Information supporting the development and management of workplace policies, procedures, and organizational standards.

subcategories.name: Financial Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to government financial management operations.

information_types.name: Accounting
information_types.description: Information supporting government accounting operations, general ledger maintenance, and financial transaction recording.

information_types.name: Funds Control
information_types.description: Information supporting funds control activities including appropriation management, allotment tracking, and obligation monitoring.

information_types.name: Payments
information_types.description: Information supporting government payment processing, disbursement operations, and vendor payment management.

information_types.name: Collections and Receivables
information_types.description: Information supporting government collections, receivables management, and revenue accounting operations.

information_types.name: Asset and Liability Management
information_types.description: Information supporting government asset tracking, liability management, and financial position reporting.

information_types.name: Reporting and Information
information_types.description: Information supporting financial reporting, audit support, and financial management information dissemination.

subcategories.name: Human Resource Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to federal human resource management functions.

information_types.name: HR Strategy
information_types.description: Information supporting human resource strategic planning, workforce analysis, and HR policy development.

information_types.name: Staff Acquisition
information_types.description: Information supporting recruitment, hiring, and onboarding of federal employees and contractors.

information_types.name: Organization and Position Management
information_types.description: Information supporting organizational structure management, position classification, and job description maintenance.

information_types.name: Compensation Management
information_types.description: Information supporting federal employee compensation including pay administration, payroll processing, and allowances.

information_types.name: Benefits Management
information_types.description: Information supporting employee benefits administration including health insurance, retirement, and leave programs.

information_types.name: Employee Performance Management
information_types.description: Information supporting employee performance evaluation, performance plans, and performance-based actions.

information_types.name: Employee Relations
information_types.description: Information supporting employee relations activities including grievances, disciplinary actions, and workplace disputes.

information_types.name: Labor Relations
information_types.description: Information supporting federal labor relations including union negotiations, collective bargaining, and labor agreements.

information_types.name: Separation Management
information_types.description: Information supporting employee separation processing including retirement, resignation, and reduction-in-force actions.

information_types.name: Human Resources Development
information_types.description: Information supporting employee training, professional development, and career management programs.

subcategories.name: Information and Technology Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to information technology management and IT service delivery.

information_types.name: System Development
information_types.description: Information supporting IT system development activities including requirements analysis, design, coding, and testing.

information_types.name: Lifecycle/Change Management
information_types.description: Information supporting IT lifecycle management, change control processes, and configuration management.

information_types.name: System Maintenance
information_types.description: Information supporting IT system maintenance, patching, upgrades, and operational support activities.

information_types.name: IT Infrastructure Maintenance
information_types.description: Information supporting the maintenance of IT infrastructure including networks, servers, and telecommunications equipment.

information_types.name: IT Security
information_types.description: Information supporting IT security operations including cybersecurity, incident response, and security monitoring.

information_types.name: Record Retention
information_types.description: Information supporting records retention schedules, archival processes, and records disposition activities.

information_types.name: Information Management
information_types.description: Information supporting enterprise information management, data governance, and information sharing policies.

subcategories.name: Supply Chain Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to acquisition, procurement, and logistics management.

information_types.name: Goods Acquisition
information_types.description: Information supporting the procurement of goods, equipment, and supplies through federal acquisition processes.

information_types.name: Inventory Control
information_types.description: Information supporting inventory management, stock control, and warehousing operations for government supplies.

information_types.name: Logistics Management
information_types.description: Information supporting logistics planning, distribution operations, and transportation of government materiel.

information_types.name: Services Acquisition
information_types.description: Information supporting the acquisition of professional, technical, and support services through federal contracting.

categories.name: Internal Risk Management and Mitigation
categories.description: Information types that support internal risk management including regulatory compliance, public affairs, revenue collection, continuity planning, and general government oversight functions.

subcategories.name: Regulatory Compliance and Enforcement
subcategories.description: Information types related to regulatory compliance, inspections, and standards development.

information_types.name: Inspections and Auditing
information_types.description: Information supporting regulatory inspections, compliance auditing, and enforcement actions against violations.

information_types.name: Standards Setting/Regulatory Development
information_types.description: Information supporting the development of regulations, standards, and rulemaking activities.

information_types.name: Permits and Licensing
information_types.description: Information supporting the issuance, management, and enforcement of permits, licenses, and certifications.

subcategories.name: Public Affairs
subcategories.description: Information types related to public communications, customer service, and public relations.

information_types.name: Customer Services
information_types.description: Information supporting citizen-facing customer service operations, call centers, and service delivery channels.

information_types.name: Official Information Dissemination
information_types.description: Information supporting the publication and dissemination of official government information to the public.

information_types.name: Product Outreach
information_types.description: Information supporting government product and service outreach, marketing, and public awareness campaigns.

information_types.name: Public Relations
information_types.description: Information supporting public relations activities, media communications, and government messaging.

subcategories.name: Revenue Collection
subcategories.description: Information types related to government revenue collection and asset management.

information_types.name: Debt Collection
information_types.description: Information supporting the collection of debts owed to the federal government including delinquent loans and overpayments.

information_types.name: User Fee Collection
information_types.description: Information supporting the collection and management of user fees, tolls, and service charges.

information_types.name: Federal Asset Sales
information_types.description: Information supporting the sale and disposal of surplus federal assets, property, and equipment.

subcategories.name: Internal Risk Management
subcategories.description: Information types related to contingency planning, continuity of operations, and service recovery.

information_types.name: Contingency Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting the development and maintenance of contingency plans for IT systems and business operations.

information_types.name: Continuity of Operations
information_types.description: Information supporting continuity of operations planning, alternate site readiness, and essential function preservation.

information_types.name: Service Recovery
information_types.description: Information supporting the recovery of government services after disruption including disaster recovery and reconstitution.

subcategories.name: General Government
subcategories.description: Information types related to government-wide planning, budgeting, and management improvement activities.

information_types.name: Legislative Relations
information_types.description: Information supporting agency interactions with the legislature including congressional liaison and testimony preparation.

information_types.name: Budget Formulation
information_types.description: Information supporting the formulation of agency budgets, budget justification, and budget submission processes.

information_types.name: Capital Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting capital investment planning, business case analysis, and portfolio management for IT and facilities.

information_types.name: Enterprise Architecture
information_types.description: Information supporting the development and maintenance of agency enterprise architecture and technology roadmaps.

information_types.name: Strategic Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting agency strategic planning, performance goal setting, and strategic initiative management.

information_types.name: Budget Execution
information_types.description: Information supporting the execution of agency budgets including apportionment, allocation, and expenditure tracking.

information_types.name: Workforce Planning
information_types.description: Information supporting workforce planning, competency gap analysis, and succession planning activities.

information_types.name: Management Improvement
information_types.description: Information supporting management improvement initiatives, organizational assessments, and process optimization.

information_types.name: Knowledge Management
information_types.description: Information supporting organizational knowledge management, lessons learned, and institutional knowledge preservation.
